meanings.definition: A board for cutting bread on.
meanings.sent1: I placed the loaf of bread on the breadboard to slice it.
meanings.sent2: The wooden breadboard is perfect for cutting homemade bread.
meanings.sent3: The breadboard looked confused when I tried to cut vegetables on it.
meanings.sent4: Her kitchen was a symphony of colors, with the breadboard as the conductor.
meanings.sent5: The breadboard's smooth surface made slicing the bread effortless.

meanings.definition: A board for making temporary electrical circuits.
meanings.sent1: He used the breadboard to quickly test his circuit design.
meanings.sent2: The electronic components were neatly arranged on the breadboard.
meanings.sent3: The breadboard giggled when the wires tickled its surface.
meanings.sent4: In his mind, the breadboard became a bustling city of electrical signals.
meanings.sent5: The breadboard hummed softly as the circuit came to life.
